mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_user_info (group_id, user_id) SELECT #{groupId}, u.id FROM user u WHERE u.email = #{userEmail}
INSERT INTO group_user_info(user_id, group_id, role_id) VALUES(#{userId},#{groupId},#{roleId})
mapper.select: SELECT gui.user_id AS userId, u.nickname AS nickName, r.name AS roleName FROM group_user_info gui JOIN user u ON gui.user_id = u.id JOIN role r ON gui.role_id = r.role_id WHERE gui.group_id = #{groupId}

SELECT inv.id AS invitation_id, inv.receiver_id AS receiver_id, u.nickname AS receiver_nickname, inv.status AS status, inv.created_at AS created_at, inv.responded_at AS responded_at FROM invitation inv JOIN user u ON inv.receiver_id = u.id WHERE inv.group_id = #{groupId}
